Function getContrastColor.

get a contrast color to given RGB values

Parameters:
$r (int) value for red (0-255)
$g (int) value for green (0-255)
$b (int) value for blue (0-255)
Returns:
color string of the RGB values separated by commas -> ready for use in CSS rgb() function

$  room,
$  bookArr 
)

Function getLessonAtRoomAndTime.

get the lesson of given room and time

Parameters:
$timestamp (int) UNIX timestamp of the lesson start time
$room (int) room number where the lesson takes place
$bookArr (Array) Array which is generated in timetable.php
Returns:
boolean/int if $timestamp and $room has been found in $bookArr, the array index will be returned. Otherwise false

Function getLessonAtTime.

$timestamp (int) UNIX timestamp of the lesson start time
$bookArr (Array) Array which is generated in timetable.php
Returns:
